org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal

Class AbstractProviderModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal.AbstractProviderModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceProviderObserver, JMXHostProvider, MetricHostProvider, MetricsServiceProvider, ProviderModule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultProviderModule

    public abstract class AbstractProviderModule
extends Object
implements ProviderModule, ResourceProviderObserver, JMXHostProvider, MetricHostProvider, MetricsServiceProvider
    An abstract provider module implementation.
